item.title: Sidi Ali ben Hemdouch: Social and Religious Dynamics in Morocco
item.description: Who is Khalid Mouna? Dr. Khalid Mouna is an anthropologist, professor of sociology at Moulay Ismail University in Meknes. His research publications focus on cannabis, social mobilization and migration. Dr. Mounaâ€™s article, â€œLe corps aÌ€ l’eÌpreuve du “sacreÌ”: le rituel du corps aÌ€ Sidi Ali Ben Hamdouch au Marocâ€, delves into the fundamental relationship between social and religious dynamics in Morocco. He studied Sidi Ali ben Hemdouch as a social laboratory to study the construction of sainthood, sacred spaces and the therapeutic power of â€œLâ€™barakaâ€ or spiritual blessings.
